path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - EtheKing Smartcontracts - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of SafeMath library
findings.description: The contract uses SafeMath library for overflow checking, which is already done by default in Solidity 0.8.0+. It's suggested to use normal arithmetic operators for readability and gas saving.

findings.title: Lock-All-ETHE-And-Vesting.sol - Unused release internal function
findings.description: The contract does not have any logic to use the release internal function and it is set as internal so normal users can't call it.
